title: Pilot scale manufacturing of black seed oil-loaded alginate beads; process development, and stability of thymoquinone
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Hamzeh Alkhatib, Farahidah Mohamed, Mulham Alfatama, Elham Assadpour, Mohammad Saeed Kharazmi, Seid Mahdi Jafari, Md Zaidul Islam Sarker, Kishor Kumar Sadasivuni, Awis Sukarni Mohmad Sabere, Abd Almonem Doolaanea
